EmailTemplate.subject: Senior College Tour 9 September 2014: Step up into our Senior College
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
- Enjoyed our Senior College Tour?
If you know of a family who might be interested in St Andrew's, we'd love you to pass on this invitation to our upcoming Senior College themed tour for 2014.
With just a few enrolment spaces left for Senior College in 2015, the tour is a great opportunity to visit our welcoming and progressive city school, tour the facilities, meet our Senior College students and staff. Details are in the attached invitation.
Bookings are essential. Places can be booked via our website at www.sacs.nsw.edu.au
I look forward to welcoming you on the day.
Regards
Bruce Perry
Registrar
_______________________________________________________
Step up into our Senior College
Independance - Flexibility - Real-world Learning
Make your final school years count. St Andrew's Senior College knows how to prepare students for life after school with:
Progressive, coeducational environment in the middle of the CBD; Greater freedoms, more responsibility and choices that cater to every type of student Learning options, with HSC or IB; Global learning through interactive technologies and international educational tours.
See for yourself and reserve a place on our Senior College Tour and find out first hand from student guides what St Andrew's can offer.
Tuesday 9 September, 2014
9:00am to 10.30am
St Andrew's House, Sydney Square, Sydney
Bookings: www.sacs.nsw.edu.au
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
